name: Saturn
description: Falernum, orgeat, and passion fruit syrup contribute the tropical flavors that make this tart rumless cocktail fit in with other tiki offerings. It's truly delicious.
recipeIngredient: 1/2 ounce passionfruit syrup (such as BG Reynolds)
1/4 ounce orgeat syrup (such as Small Hand Foods)

recipeInstructions.text: Add all ingredients to a blender and blend until smooth. Pour unstrained into a tall glass, garnish as desired.
